<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/3/person/{person_id}/movie_credits"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get the movie credits of a person

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
